Articles.Content:
Like the title says.

I'm guessing I'll need mods (any pack recommendations?) But then (assuming I've built a rocket capable of lofting the payload) how do I:

-Build the actual stage that houses the payload?

-Set staging to that it separates properly without the satallite just acting like debris (IE being a functional ship)
i recommend ksp monkeys rockets and dishware pack

i recommend ksp monkeys rockets and dishware pack

I think you mean the White Monkey Kitchenware and Space parts pack

You should be aware though that the plugin did not work with 0.15, and 0.16 introduced even more changes to the plugin system, so while this is a great pack, it is not useful for its satellite or its cargobay.

Some other packs that are very good to use when it comes to satellites are the: Silisko Industries Pack and the Kosmos Pack.

Hope this helps you out!

Thanks for the help guys.

Problem is, I'm now having trouble building payload module that doesn't rip apart during launch.
